component.description: Univocal schema for this contribution (H, E, V or L)

organization.description: Name of organization that published the dataset

model_source.description: Name of organization that published the dataset

purpose.description: Purpose for what the data has been produced

project.description: Project under which data has been produced

biblio_title.description: Purpose for what the data has been produced

project.description: Project under which data has been produced

geo_coverage.description: ISO code(s) of countries covered by the dataset, comma-separated

publish.description: Flag to show/hide dataset from website

h-res.description: Horizontal resolution in meters (raster data only)

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis, probabilistic or deterministic

geo_area.description: The name of the geographic area covered by the hazard analysis. Comma-separated list of geographic names.

time_start.description: The time at which the modelled scenario(s) starts [ISO 8601 format]

time_end.description: The time at which the modelled scenario(s) ends [ISO 8601 format]

time_span.description: The extent of the time period covered by the events included in the current scenario hazard analysis [ISO 8601 format]

time_year.description: General reference year to which the scenario refers to (e.g. '2050')

calculation_method.description: The methodology used for the calculation of this event

return_period.description: Probability of occurrence expressed as return periods list (10, 100, 1000) or range (10-1000)

occurence_time_start.description: The start date (and possibly time) of the time period used to specify either the frequency or the occurrence_probability [ISO 8601 format]

occurence_time_end.description: The end date (and possibly time) of the time period used to specify either the frequency or the occurrence_probability [ISO 8601 format]

occurence_time_span.description: The duration (years) of the period used to specify either the frequency or the occurrence_probability

trigger_hazard_type.description: Hazard type that triggered the event

trigger_process_type.description: Process type that triggered the event

description.description: Provides additional information about this specific event

data_uncertainty.description: Comments about the uncertainty of data

exposure.title: Exposure dataset metadata
exposure.description: Metadata that is specific to datasets that describe the situation of people, infrastructure, housing, production capacities and other tangible human assets located in hazard-prone areas.

occupancy.description: Type of occupancy to which function applies

taxonomy_code.description: Taxonomy code to which function applies

country_tranferability.description: ISOa3 list of countries in which the model could be applied

local_applicability.description: Area within a country or region to wich the model specifically applies

transferability_notes.description: Details about applicability to different areas

calculation_method.description: The methodology used for the calculation of the function

f_relationship.description: Type of relationship: Mathematical or Discrete

analysis_details.description: Description of analysis that produced the function

n_events.description: Number of events the function has been built on

n_assets.description: Number of assets the function has been built on

is_edp_thre.description: Is the damage scale is associated to an engineered-design parameter threshold?

is_dm_factor.description: Is the damage scale is associated to a damage factor?

is_casualties.description: Is the damage scale is associated to a casualties estimation?

is_downtime.description: Is the damage scale is associated to a downtime estimation (e.g. service interruption)?

time_start.description: The time at which the modelled scenario(s) starts [ISO 8601 format]

time_end.description: The time at which the modelled scenario(s) ends [ISO 8601 format]

time_year.description: General reference year to which the scenario refers to (e.g. '2050')

occupancy.description: Destination of use of the asset

return_period.description: Probability of occurrence expressed as return periods list (10, 100, 1000) or range (10-1000)

calculation_method.description: The methodology used for the calculation of this event

Exposure.title: Exposure
Exposure.description: Metadata that is specific to datasets that describe the situation of people, infrastructure, housing, production capacities and other tangible human assets located in hazard-prone areas.

category.title: Exposure category
category.description: The category of the assets described in the dataset.

taxonomy.title: Exposure taxonomy scheme
taxonomy.description: The name of the taxonomy scheme used to create descriptive individual asset feature strings within the dataset.

reference_period.title: Reference period
reference_period.description: A general reference period to which the modelled exposure data or exposure scenario refers.

cost.title: Asset cost
cost.description: The exposure costs associated with specific elements of assets detailed in the dataset.

Category.title: Exposure category
Category.description: The category of the exposed assets, from the closed exposure category codelist.

Cost.title: Asset cost
Cost.description: The costs associated with specific elements of assets detailed in the dataset.

type.title: Cost type
type.description: The type of the cost, from the closed cost type codelist.

unit.title: Cost unit
unit.description: The unit in which the cost is specified, from the closed currency codelist.
